basic_information.scholarship_name: PET Holdings and Hollister-Boeing Pre-Vet Scholarship

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Mathematics and Science pursuing a degree in Pre-Veterinary Medicine. Eligibility Requirements College of Mathematics and Science student Undergraduate Chemistry or Biology major 3.5 GPA or above Minimum one year experience at an emergency veterinary hospital Must have volunteer experience at an animal rescue group or shelter Must have no arrest record Two faculty recommendations

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
